None.Name: Life Stealer
None.Description: 15% of the damage dealt by the unit will be added to its life points.

None.Name: Infused Partisans
None.Description: Active to make unit deal 30% more damage against ranged enemies.It will then deal 30% less damage against close-combat opponents,though. Attacked targets can only move at walk speed for 10s. Last until deactivated.
